meanings.definition: The act of applying oil to something.
meanings.sent1: After the game, the coach did the oiling of the baseball gloves.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the oiling of her bicycle chain to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The oiling of the squeaky door made it sound like a singing mouse.
meanings.sent4: His words were like oiling on troubled waters, calming everyone down.
meanings.sent5: The old machine required regular oiling to prevent rust and wear.

meanings.definition: The process of lubricating with oil.
meanings.sent1: Regular oiling of the gears keeps the machinery running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic performed the oiling of the car engine to prevent friction.
meanings.sent3: The oiling of the rusty lock made it open with a satisfying click.
meanings.sent4: The oiling of the joints in the robot made its movements fluid and precise.
meanings.sent5: Proper oiling of the bike chain is essential for a comfortable ride.

meanings.definition: The act of treating with oil.
meanings.sent1: The spa offers a relaxing oiling treatment for the hair and scalp.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the oiling of her skin to keep it soft and moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The oiling of the salad with a special dressing made it taste heavenly.
meanings.sent4: The oiling of the wooden furniture brought out its natural shine.
meanings.sent5: Regular oiling of the leather jacket keeps it looking new.
